text: These were sons of Caleb, sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah: Shobal, the father of Kiriath-jearim,
descendants of Asnah, descendants of the Meunites, descendants of the Nephusites,
Therefore, my children, be zealous for the law and give your lives for the covenant of our ancestors.
But they did not understand what he said to them.
